subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Dale Hunter, one of four Capitals players whose jersey (No. 32) hangs from the rafters of Verizon Center, was named to coach the team Monday, replacing the fired Bruce Boudreau.
snippet: Dale Hunter, one of four Capitals players whose jersey (No. 32) hangs from the rafters of Verizon Center, was named to coach the team Monday, replacing the fired Bruce Boudreau.
